texte.title: DATIPLUS the #1 expert in protecting isolated workers.
texte.part1: With our commercial brand DATIPLUS, we protect isolated employees from over 1,500 companies.
texte.part2: Comfortable, our solutions adapt to everyone. Protection becomes unobtrusive. Motion sensors constantly detect the wearer's activity.
texte.part3: Artificial intelligence algorithms process this data to learn each user's habits and better detect abnormal situations (falls, decreased activity, late waking, etc.).
texte.part4: As soon as a distress situation is detected, an alert is sent to company contacts or a security control room.

development.title: Software Development and Applications
development.texte: Learning programming languages (Java, C#, PHP, Python, HTML, CSS). Creating software applications that meet organizational needs. Designing, modeling, and integrating IT solutions.

projectManagement.title: IT Project Management
projectManagement.texte: Using project management methodologies (agile, scrum, etc.). Planning, monitoring, and managing IT development projects. Integrating and deploying software in the organizational environment.

dataBase.title: Databases and IT Systems
dataBase.texte: Designing, creating, and managing databases. Understanding the principles and operation of IT systems. Administering and maintaining IT networks.

communication.title: Communication, Technical Support, and Teamwork
communication.texte: Good communication and understanding of user needs. Technical support for users and internal teams. Ability to work in a team and collaborate with other professionals.

development.title: Development
development.texte: Algorithms and data structures (C language), Linux systems and tools, Web technologies, Embedded systems development (C language), Object-oriented programming, Scripting languages, Distributed applications, Software engineering.

electronics.title: Data Capture, Transmission, Electronics
electronics.texte: Electronics: data instrumentation and capture, Transmission physics, Components for execution architecture, Telecommunication chain, Network principles, Communicating objects: communication protocols, Embedded technologies and environments, Real-time embedded system design, Embedded and cross-compiled applications, Securing data and hardware exchanges.

dataBase.title: Data
dataBase.texte: Relational databases, NoSQL, Numeric programming and calculation tools, Data backup, Algorithms for data analysis, Data visualization, Specific data, Cloud computing, Machine learning, big data and BI projects.

professionalEnvironment.title: Professional Environment
professionalEnvironment.texte: Project management, Digital legislation, Written expression techniques, English, Creativity techniques, Financial management, Marketing, HR management, Business strategy.

fc_tence_foot.title: FC Tence (05/31/2021-06/27/2021)
fc_tence_foot.description: During my web development internship, I created a site using HTML, CSS, and PHP Object. I designed a responsive interface, implemented interactive data management, optimized performance, and reinforced security. This project strengthened my web development skills and allowed me to create a functional website.

mairie_tence.title: Tence Town Hall (01/03/2022-02/11/2022)
mairie_tence.description: During my web development internship at the Tence Town Hall, I created a fully customized site using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and a PHP framework developed from scratch. I designed a user-friendly interface and integrated interactive features to enhance the town hall's online presence.

portfolio_bts.title: BTS Portfolio
portfolio_bts.description: My BTS web development portfolio showcases my commitment to creating a complete website. I used a range of technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, PHP, and object-oriented programming (PHP Object). I designed this website from scratch, marking a significant milestone in my journey.

mon_entreprise.title: Datiplus Client Space
mon_entreprise.description: Currently in a learning phase, I had the opportunity to contribute to the 'Datiplus' client space project based on the Symfony PHP framework. Within this team, I participated in enhancing existing features, creating new functionalities, and integrating a new product. This experience not only allowed me to learn more about Symfony but also introduced me to the professional world of web development, enriching my current education.

portfolio_ecole_ingenieur.title: Portfolio
portfolio_ecole_ingenieur.description: My current portfolio reflects my ever-evolving education and skills. I work with Symfony 6 as the main framework while delving into learning Vue.js 3 for dynamic frontend applications. My knowledge in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Docker, and PHP continues to grow. I leverage these ever-evolving skills to develop quality web projects while staying at the forefront of the latest technologies.
